parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: Type of reference entity as defined by swSelectType_e

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Type of reference entity as defined by swSelectType_e

title: ISimpleHoleFeatureData2.GetDirectionReference
description: Gets the direction of the cut extrude for this simple hole feature.
signature:
System.Int32 GetDirectionReference( 
   out System.Object
Ref1
,
   out System.Int32
Type1
,
   out System.Object
Ref2
,
   out System.Int32
Type2
)

parameters.name: Type1
parameters.description: Type of reference entity as defined by swSelectType_e

parameters.name: Type2
parameters.description: Type of reference entity as defined by swSelectType_e

returns: Number of reference entities used to define the direction of this hole feature
remarks:
Sometimes one reference entity defines a direction; for example, an edge or axis. Other times, two reference entities define a direction; for example, two vertices or two sketch points.
If...
Then...
One reference entity defined the direction
Ref2 is NULL and the return value  is 1
Two reference entities defined the direction
Both Ref1 and Ref2 are non-NULL and return value is 2
Valid reference entities for Ref1 and Ref2:
line segment
edge
axis
vertex
face
plane
sketch point
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
